title: Fantastis

title: amazing

text: Overall so good, makanan dan kamar bagus, tidak ada yang kurang, baik dari sisi penyajian, pelayanan restoran, pelayanan kamar, dan makanan yang disediakan cukup bervariasi, pelayan restoran ramah dan baik
title: Liburan di Grand Keisha

text:
Lokasinya dekat dengan Mall Pakuon, fasilitas kamar sangat baik, nyaman, kedap suara, bersih, view gunung Merapi. Staff sangat ramah, sehingga saya sangat nyaman. saya membawa jambu biji yang saya bali dari pasar tradisional, staf restoran menawarkan untuk dikupaskan saat saya memesan makanan disana, pelayanan yang sangat baik! 

Menu makan enak, ada jajanan tradisonal bahkan ada Jamu (favorite saya). Hanya saja restonya rame sekali, jadi penuh. 

Saya akan kembali ke Hotel ini saat saya berkunjung ke Jogja 👍

Saran: sebaiknya tersedia layanan antar jemput Bandara / stasiun, ini akan sangat membantu.
title: Staff yang sangat ramah dan memberikan pelayanan yang baik

text: Pelayanannya sangat memuaskan terutama para staffnya yang sangat ramah dan selalu sedia untuk membantu terutama mbak luluk yang sudah membantu saya menjelaskan fasilitas yang ada di hotel tersebut. Sukses selalu.
title: Good Experience!!!!

text:
Kamar & pelayanan breakfast nya luar biasa keren. Special Thanks buat Mba Octa yg selalu membantu & memberi solusi terbaik di saat breakfast.

Seluruh karyawan juga sangat ramah & menyapa dgn hangat.

God Bless
title: Very nice hotel

text: Di hari jadi kami ke 6, dapet surprize cake dr hotel Grand Keisha. worth it banget untuk nginep sini lagi, breakfast menu pilihan banyak dan enak, kamar rapi bersih, kolam renang jernih. Terima kasih pelayanannya Grand Keisha.

text: So So Hotel ya, ini parkiran aja sampe kemana2 ada bbrp lot parking yang tersebar di sekitaran Hotel, Lokasi Hotel sendiri di Daerah Depok, Sleman, dan letak nya juga tidak terlalu strategis, hotel bintang 3 ini (ngaku nya Bintang 4) dlu nya dikelola oleh Horizon Hotel Chain, yang pada saat ini sudah dikelola secara Mandiri oleh owner Hotel. Menurut saya Hotel ini sangat biasa saja, Kita juga jika tidak terpaksa tidak akan menginap disini. Yang buruk adalah kolam renang nya yang sudah seperti kubangan air nya butek dan tidak ada prokes sama sekali, sekali lagi saya katakan bahwa hotel ini kurang di manage dengan baik, untung saja kamar nya bersih dan nyaman untuk sekedar beristirahat atau tidur saja. Walking distance juga ke hartono mall Dibawah 1 KM, overall jika ada hotel yang lebih baik dan lebih mahal, pertimbangkan kembali lah untuk menginap disini.
title: So So Grand Keisha Depok Sleman

text: Kesan pertama saya tentang hotel ini adalah sebuah hotel yang mewah dengan konsep mediterania yang unik (ditambah dengan seragam karyawan front desk serta concierge menyambut tahun baru dengan kostum aladin menambah kentalnya suasana mediterania), lokasinya yang jauh dari pusat kota dimana kawasan pusat kota akan menjadi rame banget, apalagi musim liburan seperti ini. Proses cek-in nya cepat banget (terima kasih untuk welcome drink-nya .... rasanya unik). Sudah menjadi kebiasaan saya setelah sampai di kamar, saya selalu mengecek bantal yang akan saya pergunakan. Bantalnya besar-besar dan empuk banget ditambah sarung bantalnya juga halus. Hmmmm, I WILL LOVE MY STAY HERE. Kamarnya luas banget, dengan dekorasi perpaduan Jawa dan mediterania menambah saya semakin betah untuk tinggal lebih lama disini (sayapun memutuskan untuk menambah waktu menginap saya) kamar mandinya luas dan showernya juga lancar banget. Sayang sekali koneksi wifi nya agak tersendat, untungnya saya membawa modem sehingga saya tidak kesulitan untu menyelesaikan pekerjaan saya melalui laptop. Menu sarapannya komplit banget, juga menu makan malam di KEBON KOPI ROOFTOP. Pengalaman menginap paling mengesankan disini. Untuk seluruh staff, keep up your good work, terimakasih telah memberikan pengalaman mengesankan selama saya menginap disini

text:
Beberapa hari yg lalu saya mengadakan meeting di hotel ini dgn jumlah peserta lebih dr 250 pax dan kami menggunakan pleno untuk opening & closing serta 5 ruangan breakout (pleno digunakan untuk breakout jg). Dan selama saya mengadakan meeting baru kali ini saya merasa sangat puas dan terbantu khususnya untuk tim banquet. Saya bbrapa kali ganti layout dr 1 kls ke 5 kls ke 2 kls balik lg ke 5 kls dan akhirnya ke 1 kls. Tapi saya tdk menemukan kendala sama sekali. Selesai menggunakan 1 kls sejam berikutnya tim banquet sdh selesai set up yg 5 kls dan begitu selanjutnya supeerrrr cekatan. Dan tnpa saya meminta mereka selalu mengirimkan foto ruangan yg sdh di set up sehingga saya tdk perlu bulak balik cek meeting room. Tdk ada mengeluh tdk ada cemberut. Mereka selalu ramah ! Pdhal saya bawel dan bnyak mau. Pokoknya recomended place for meeting !
Big thanks for banquet team of grand keisha (ilham, thomas, indra dan semua yg saya lupa namanya) dan big big thanks for DOSM mas edwin yg selalu flexible membantu kami.
Kamar pun ga kalah kerennya. Setiap hari kamar selalu rapih dan bersih. Awal c/i sblm jam 12 kmar udh ready 80 kmar. Mknn enak. Ahh semua di hotel ini super duper keren.
Terimakasih tidak membuat saya teriak marah2 heheh

text:
Hotel ini menurut kami cukup bagus krn kelihatan masih baru.  Awal datang di sbut oleh beberapa pria berbatik dan bellboy , mereka ramah sekali menyambut dan membantu kami. Setelah check in selesai dan cepat proses nya kami mendapatkan welcome drink.  Di hotel lain kami dapat welcome drink hanya di antarkan di taruh di meja atau bahkan cm di meja untuk di ambil sendiri, tetapi disini beda di antarkan dan di tunggu sampai selesai minum benar benar menghargai tamu. Oh ya lobby cukup luas dan wangi.  Naik ke atas menuju kamar melihat lorong sangat bagus sekali desain eropa kental srkali di hotel ini.  Masuk ke kamar dan kamar nya bagus sekali.  Kami mendapat kamar menghadap swiming pool,  kamar mandi biasa saja, kasur empuk dan nyaman,  sarapan pagi banyak dan variatif . Rasa jg enak.  Tapi sempat ada sedikit insiden yang membuat kami kurang sreg yaitu saat sarapan hari kedua kami di bilang oleh staff restoran nanti bill sarapan kami akan di tagih ke room karena kami tidak include breakfast, jujur kami kesal karena malu dengan tamu lain yang ada disitu , setelah mereka cek ulang ternyata benar kami include breakfast dan persilahkan ambil makanan apalagi kami ambil 2 room disitu masa sekedar breakfast aja kami tidak mau include. 
Overall hotel ini staff nya sangat ramah dan GM nya jg sangat responsif krn kami ketik komentar di ig hotel ini di respon langsung oleh GM nya.  Security disini jg ramah sekali dan tidak tegang karena mungkin sadar yang di jaga sebuah hotel bukan demo jadi mengutamakan senyum.

We had falafel, paratha & chicken curry and for dessert we chose baklava. We were not let down. Everything was very tasty and well presented. The staff were very friendly and our waiter Ito was always smiling and happy to explain the menu. The ambience was pleasant with panoramic views over the city. Ito told us that during the day Mount Merapi is also clearly visible. We will definitely return when we are back in Yogyakarta. Thank you very much

 (-): It’s very disturbing to see blood stain one one of the bed cover. Luckily, staffs promptly response my complaint and change the cover directly. text:
what makes me interested in staying at this hotel is  reviews of hotel's cleanliness.  and for 4 days I proved it. 
I was late check in at first day. I arrived at the hotel at 8 pm and was greeted by the hospitality of the staff in the lobby.  when entering the room, the smell of fresh rooms was inhabited.  another surprise I found at the table.  luckily i got a welcome greeting in a delicious chocolate cake.  The room's clean and so the bathroom.  I got a room on the 7th floor with incredible views of Mount Merapi.  I realized it the next day when I woke up early morning because I deliberately did not close the window curtain.  the beauty of the morning sun from the room took my breath away.  
breakfast is served with a varied menu and all delicious.  very suitable for traveling with family.  staff around are ready to help and ask how we think by staying at this hotel.  I met the hotel the general manager and talked with her.  how lucky I was on the 3rd day my hotel room was upgraded to a junior suit.  woooowww ... how happy I was to get a room with more space and a bathroom with a bath tub.  very suitable because on the third day my husband and daughter would joint with me there.  
overall the bed in the hotel are very comfortable to get maximum rest and relax.  I highly recommend this hotel for your place to stay while in Jogja.  FYI ... this hotel is close to one of the biggest malls in Jogja.  enjoy your time at Grand Keisha Hotel.
title: A perfect place to stay while in Jogja

Warm welcome, with the tastiest welcome drink we had on vacation and very friendly and helpful staff. Many tours / rides we booked with fair prices directly through the hotel.

We would have wished that all the hotels on our tour of Indonesia would have been like the Grand Keisha.

text: I stayed for 13 days while visiting Yogyakarta. The staff was very helpful and kind. The location is great, most attractions are within 15 minute taxi ride averaging less that $2 USD. The quality of food for breakfast is exceptional and changes daily but always an extensive selection of popular dishes including fresh fruit, local traditional food, Chinese and western classics. Room service was fast an delicious. Pool was smaller than expected. Not all staff spoke English but someone was always near which could speak well enough to assist me. Underground parking was secure an valet service was helpful. Highly recommend this hotel for its modern comfortable features, attractive styling, an exceptional staff and services. I was always greeted with smiles and warm greetings when returning. I will stay here again when visiting in the future.
title: Very pleased with quality of hotel, food and staff.

text:
This is a brand new hotel if I'm not mistaken, launch in 2017.
Of course the rooms are still new, nice. the lay out no complain, from standard room until suite room (due to group booking, I'm able to see all kind of room).
Food that served during breakfast are delicious and had many kind of local/international food. But please make jamu (local herbal), not too sweet. Just make it without sugar and let the guest add it if they need it.
During dinner, we try barbecue and it tasted good. I ordered also chicken barbecue and fried noodle, also tasted good. So, no issue from food and room...
It was all almost perfect for hotel that a little bit far from Malioboro (center of Yogyakarta) but some things that we noticed need to be improve:
- Lift...it takes too long to wait, especially when there are conference, during morning, lunch and around 4pm, it was hard to get inside the lift. please modify how to operate it since we now that you could not add more...
- Gym, had only 1 treadmill and limited others. we had to queued before used it. Pool also too small.
- during our session, hotel staffs not stand by in the room, and the battery of our mike off many times.
- ballroom also not sound prrof, during our sessions, many sound from outside could be heard from our meeting room.
- the worse: no vacuum during room make up, in my room. also not refill the tea inside the room. I had to make some note to vacuum and refill, but still not a clean one.
They said that due to still limited staffs so they need to hire from students to help them. Well it will be an issue since guests only see it as hotels staffs, no matter what.
These reason prevent my self to give 4 stars, so, right now 3 stars until the service could be improved...
title: New, nice room, please improve service

My stay with hotel Grand Keischa in Jogjakarta.

I had a great time in this 4 stars hotel with a guaranteed good price. Delicious breakfast (asian & western) fantastic de Luxe room  nice  outside pool, clean and incredible friendly well trained staff. 
In one word this Classic hotel is a TOP! We recommend Grand Keisha  not only for the Asian but mostly for the foreigners outside Asian  on vacantion or do there business in this traditional city Jogjakarta.

text:
We stayed 4 nights at Grand Keisha from Sep 5th 2017 - Sep 9th 2017 with elders in Family.

* Execellent Room Service - We never imagined that service will be great to such an extent. Check-in check-out less than five minutes. Welcome drink, welcome cake & fruits at room.

* Excellent Restaurant Services - All staffs at restaurant are very nice. more friendly. We are pure vegetarian. Chef prepared special vegetarian menu for every day breakfast, prepared food even at 11PM in the night (closing time). Everyday manager came and asked personally about next day veg breakfast. They even packed bread & fruits for our early flight. I never heard "No" from them. Extra-ordinary service at restaurant. I haven't seen such a service even at 5 start hotels.

* Rooms - Are very spacious, clean and ethnic themed. 

* Close proximity to airport and city centers - almost 5-6 KM range to Airport, Sultan Palace, Taman Sari, 40 min drive to Prambanan & Kaliurang, 1 1/2 hour drive to Borobudor, 2 hour drive to Goa Jomblang & Goa Pindul caves.

Ottoman Sky Lounge was closed all the 4 days for some meeting/training. We booked this hotel only after hearing that there is rooftop turkish restaurant. This was bit disappointing. The only suggestion - I feel, pub is must for tourists at least open until 12 or 1AM everyday to chill.

I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Though this hotel is marked as 4* hotel, i would rate service is more than 7*.
title: Excellent Service & Great Rooms

text:
Spend an extended weekend there recently and the reviews you can find for this property are certainly true. It is a great place to stay. Conveniently located in easy reach of the airport or Malioboro road for example. 

The check in was efficient and very friendly. Welcoming towards us and helpful as well. The room was spacious and in a very nice design, a touch of colonial style you could say. Clean room with a spacious bathroom; also the areas outside of the room were well maintained.

Breakfast was very good value for money; and most of all tasty food. The Chef at the egg live station was very friendly and efficient, always helpful despite being a bit loaded with orders. Also the rest of the service crew was friendly and helpful.

Check out as well went very smooth and efficient, all done within a very short time. Again the same lady who checked us in. Certainly good experience.

The only slight downfall were the security team members. They seem a bit not truly into hospitality and sometimes a bit complicated and not that helpful or organized. 

Overall still a great experience and on the next visit to Yogyakarta certainly book there again.
title: 4* Hotel with 5* services

Nice to hear you will go back & recommend to your clients.

Once again, thank you for your WOW testimony and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in your next visit to Yogyakarta.

Best regards,
AR. Atik Damarjati
General Manager
